definition: to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth
logical/only to be expected/rational and clearly structured (of text)

sentences.english: Nani's passage to the World Cup with Portugal was plain sailing by comparison with Evra's exertions.
sentences.chinese: 納尼進入世界盃比起埃弗拉來講就順理成章的多。

sentences.english: Therefore, the Zhouyi's way of thinking has naturally become the basis for Chinese medicine.
sentences.chinese: 《周易》的思維模式也順理成章地成爲中醫學的基礎。

sentences.english: Mr. Chan's experience makes him a natural candidate to succeed Mr. Yam.
sentences.chinese: 陳德霖的經驗使他成爲任志剛順理成章的接班候選人。

sentences.english: Speed is vital to him. Spontaneity is more than ever the hallmark of good speaking.
sentences.chinese: 出口成章現已成爲優秀演講的標誌性特徵。

sentences.english: The roof logically became a part of the existing green mound.
sentences.chinese: 屋頂順利成章地成爲現有的綠色山丘的一部分。

sentences.english: By applying rationalism to experience, humans can make logical leaps.
sentences.chinese: 將理論應用於實踐，人類就能順理成章地進行飛躍。

sentences.english: A matter of course, two young and lonely hearts together.
sentences.chinese: 順理成章地，兩顆年輕又孤寂的心走到了一起。

sentences.english: It would follow,then,that souls can't split.
sentences.chinese: 順理成章，靈魂無法被分裂。

sentences.english: It stands to reason that you take the Bus in this heavy rain.
sentences.chinese: 在豪雨天裏你搭公車是順理成章的事。

sentences.english: Power and prestige of the Qupai gongs, Chengzhang both independent and combination sets.
sentences.chinese: 威風鑼鼓的曲牌，既獨立成章，又聯綴成套。

definition: writing style (formal)/to send an official written communication
in a few words (idiom); expressed succinctly
to transmit a document (up or down a chain of bureaucracy)
everything clear and orderly (idiom); neat and tidy
the train of thought in writing
to conform to no conventional pattern/unconventional/offbeat
to finish (a letter, a painting) at a stroke
properly/satisfactorily/firmly/very fitting/appropriate/proper/to be in good order/also written 妥貼|妥贴[tuo3 tie1]
to write freely/to express oneself as one pleases
